entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early in the afternoon then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill near minus 26. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
